sources.title: Decision of Faith | Full Movie | Christian Drama Movie
sources.description:
Decision of Faith | Full Movie | Christian Drama Movie

When tragedy strikes the Miller family, their faith becomes shaken, forcing them on a path of choices leading to the ultimate decision of rebuilding unity, restoring hope, and rediscovering the unfailing love and unending grace of God.

2012.  Stars: Suzanne Sacks, Michael Opal, Natalie Stavola
